name: VR Feel the Nature 3D
description:
Breathe and relax now.. You will be starting a meditating journey with this VR 3D application.

Feel the Nature includes 4 scenes where you can move freely and explore.
Village, park, windmill and forest environments.

High quality images and meditating nature sounds and music included.

How to Play:
* Select the scene you want to explore from the menu
* Move by just looking where you want to go. So easy

Please recommend our app if you enjoy it. The application works with all cardboard compatible virtual reality headsets.
